docs.snippet: Our top 10 comments of the week: Readers discussed N.F.L. players protesting police brutality, women driving in Saudi Arabia and private moments with Playboy.

headline.main: New York Today: How Did the Subways Get So Bad?

docs.snippet: Our government belongs to us, so let’s start acting like it.
